name: HALAVEN
treatmentDescriptions: Halaven is indicated for the treatment of adult patients with locally advanced or metastatic breast cancer who have progressed after at least one chemotherapeutic regimen for advanced disease. Prior therapy should have included an anthracycline and a taxane in either the adjuvant or metastatic setting  unless patients were not suitable for these treatments.Halaven is indicated for the treatment of adult patients with unresectable liposarcoma who have received prior anthracycline containing therapy (unless unsuitable) for advanced or metastatic disease.
warnings: תרופה מוגבלת לרישום ע'י רופא מומחה או הגבלה אחרת
